features: One 12 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Very Emollient Original Body Lotion
Hydrates and nourishes normal to dry skin while providing hydration
Creamy, hypo-allergenic lotion packed with rich botanical emollients
No parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
body.description: This lightweight lotion is a skin softening superstar packed with rich, botanical emollients that deliver all day hydration*. With a medley of aloe vera, green tea and chamomile extracts, and an added dose of antioxidants, skin is nourished and replenished on contact. Richly hydrating and hypo-allergenic, it absorbs quickly, with no greasy residue. Your skin will thank you. Great for use during massage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Original Body Lotion This lightweight lotion is a skin softening superstar packed with rich, botanical emollients that deliver all day hydration*. With a medley of aloe vera, green tea and chamomile extracts, and an added dose of antioxidants, skin is nourished and replenished on contact. Richly hydrating and hypo-allergenic, it absorbs quickly, with no greasy residue. Your skin will thank you. Great for use during massage.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Very Emollient Herbal Healing Body Lotion Very Emollient Sparkling Mint Bath & Shower Gel Very Emollient Island Citrus Bath & Shower Gel Very Emollient Midnight Tuberose Bath & Shower Gel More Very Emollient Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Botanical extracts such as aloe, bamboo, cannabis oil and turmeric provide therapeutic, repairing care for dry skin. Made with aloe and coconut oil, this rich-lathering body wash gently cleanses and moisturizes dry, sensitive skin. Made with botanicals such as citrus, chamomile and lavender, this rich-lathering body wash gently cleanses and hydrates dry, sensitive skin. Made with aloe, chamomile and lavender, this rich-lathering body wash gently cleanses and hydrates dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY TRIED AND TRUE STAPLE
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Alba lotion and body care products for 22 years. I swear by them. This lotion is definitely worth every penny. It has a thick, rich consistency and moisturizes like a dream but, it's not greasy. It also has a very light Jasmine scent that has never irritated my skin and mixes well with any other fragrance you may wear. It soothes the driest of skin and got rid of my eczema patches. I highly recommend this and their eye de-puffing serum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is seriously thick and rich and will keep your skin from drying up. It’s also not full of junk, so I have piece of mind wearing it daily. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy customer for life.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this lotion for years! This is the only brand I use. I have extremely dry skin and I have tried every low to mid range priced lotion you can think of. No other lotion keeps me as moisturized as Alba Emollient. I usually use the Original Scent. The smell reminds me of stale hard candy lol! At first it was off putting but I stuck with it because it worked better than any other lotion Ive tried. Im glad I did because now I actually prefer the Original scent to the Unscented. The scent is light enough that it goes away fairly quickly and I am able to use my scented lotions over it. I just recently tried the Maximum lotion and it also works great! It can be a little thick to apply so I just add a little bit of filtered water to the bottle and shake it up if I need to thin it out. This lotion has all but cured my eczema, as long as I apply it after every shower, and I don't have to feel guilty about the amount of lotion I'm putting into my body because of all of the great ingredients! I hope it never changes!I received my product in great timing and customer service is great. I would definitely buy from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I love that I can subscribe and save to get this product regularly. I live in a country where I can’t find it anywhere. I have tried the coconut, the maximum, and now this one the original and I think it’s my favorite one! It has a little bit of a thicker consistency then regular lotion and even though it’s unscented, it still has a slight “clean” smell to it. I use it everyday on my entire body, it’s the only lotion I will use! My only issue was the pump came undone during shipping and lotion escaped, which I can’t really complain about it did make it overseas, but maybe just a strip of packing tape put tightly over the pump to prevent the pump from coming up might help that. All in all great product highly recommend so thankful it ships here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this after trying it at physical therapy. This one has no overwhelming sent . I have sensitive skin that breaks out easy this doesn’t do that to me. Over all a good body lotion which also works for massage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2017
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite moisturizer. The soothing chamomile, aloe, and green tea is great for my irritable, itchy skin. The moisture fees luxurious and I would definitely recommend it for dry skin. It stays all day and treats even my rough patches rather quickly. My skin feels and looks great. Some say "greasy" finish, but I'd say "silky." And honestly, I've never had a moisturizer worth a darn that didn't have that finish. This lotion means business. The scent is delectable- chamomile and jojoba, but with a little freshness to it from the aloe. Not overwhelming, just clean.Finally, the pump bottle is SO convenient and it's paraben/pthalate free. I'll definitely keep buying this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Happy to get them in a large size for a really good price because I use them every day, head to toe, even as a night time facial moisturizer. For me, there is no reason to get additional creams and potions. I am in my 60's and the weight and moisturizing properties are just right for a hydrated feel without any promises of miraculous ingredients. I get the two original formulas and one is supposed to be extra moisturizing, but they seem fairly similar. The scent is "lotion" scent, not off-putting or strong. It is slightly sweet where I might want more of a forrest smell, but that's just me and it is not going to get in the way of my ordering another bottle. P.S. I work outside in all weather and have never had an adverse sun-related reaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bottle contained lotion, but not Alba unscented
reviews.reviewText: The bottle arrived unsealed. It had a strong scent (I am allergic to scent). I use Alba unscented all the time and this was a replacement bottle. The lotion is a different color than my prior bottle. I suspect, this is not really Alba unscented.

reviews.reviewTitle: A little goes a long way..
reviews.reviewText: Very smoothing and moisturizing, a little goes a long way! Trust me! The smell isn’t nice but once it’s on there is no scent left on your skin so it’s okay. It’s more for the health of your skin then scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted to find this item again, as I had used it before. As I've aged, my skin has become so dry, flaky and soemtimes sore. Alba really does go into the skin to nourish it and keep it soft for longer than other moisturisers, some of which have a tendency to just sit on top of the skin. The fabulous 32oz bottle is very good value for money, and believe me I've tried a few. This is the best I've found.
他のどのボディクリームよりずば抜けてしっとりする。長時間しっとりで、香りが私の好み。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This was a life saver for my dry skin. It really 'watered' my dry - very dry skin and kept it moist through the day. More purchasing for me. Very happy with it.
